channel.description: Recent content in major project on Joe Wright's Github Site

item.title: Is the 40-yard dash a predictor for NFL success?
item.description: Come NFL Draft season, no prospect testing metric is talked about more than the prestigious 40-yard dash. This famous sprint tasks NFL hopefuls with covering 40 yards of ground in the fastest time possible. The test is particularly important for offensive skill positions like running back and wide receiver, as acceleration and speed is a catalyst for offensive firepower. But is the 40-yard dash a predictor for NFL success?

item.title: What was the most valuable position in the NBA during the 2019-2020 season?
item.description: One of the most heated debates amongst NBA fanatics is over which player deserves the Most Valuable Player (MVP) award for each given season. It is a purposefully subjective award that stirs the pot and incites heated arguments between both media members and fans about what value really means in the NBA. While this debate is a fascinating discussion, I want to look at player value in a much broader sense.
